About Me Maidanov Miras Yellow star aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa 

aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa Hey, my name is Maidanov Miras! 
Currently I am second year student at "Astana IT University". 

My interests right now are sports, filming, music and recently app development. 
In terms of sports, I like to go to gym as it's a good habit that will improve your health and physical appearance. 

I got interested in filming after courses that we had on first trimester. To be exact Video and Audio electronics. 
There we had engaging assignments. 

And last, but not least - "App development". 
I am beginner in this field and by writing this text I am doing my second assignment based on "Android app development" course.
Avatar Orange star What is your Nickname? Done
